sentences.en: Even if the boy is of uncommon brilliance, he should not have been praised to the skies.
sentences.cn: 即使那男孩确实聪明过人, 也不该把他捧到天上去.

sentences.en: He is also respected for his brilliance as an artist.
sentences.cn: 他的艺术才华同样被人尊敬。
他的演奏显示出他卓越的才华.

sentences.en: He was a deeply serious musician who had shown his brilliance very early.
sentences.cn: 他是个很严肃的音乐家，很早就展露出非凡的才华。

sentences.en: His brilliance renders this film an indubitable classic.
sentences.cn: 他的出色表现让这部电影成为了毋庸置疑的经典。

sentences.en: His eyes became accustomed to the dark after the brilliance of the sun outside.
sentences.cn: 从阳光耀眼的室外走进来后，他的双眼开始适应了黑暗。

sentences.en: I was totally amazed by the brilliance of her paintings.
sentences.cn: 她的绘画才能令我惊歎不已.

sentences.en: It was a performance of incomparable brilliance.
sentences.cn: 那是场精彩绝伦的演出。

sentences.en: She has a reputation for brilliance. Also, she is gorgeous.
sentences.cn: 她以才华出众而闻名。此外，她还非常漂亮。

sentences.en: She loved his brilliance and his generous heart.
sentences.cn: 她深爱他的才华横溢和古道热肠。

sentences.en: The brilliance of his name shines in the pages of history.
The brilliance of truth cannot be dimmed ; the eyesight of the mountain eagle cannot be blocked by dense fog.
sentences.cn: 真理的光辉不怕笼罩,山鹰的眼睛不怕密雾.

sentences.en: The Chicago Bulls has lost its former brilliance.
sentences.cn: 芝加哥公牛队失去了往日的辉煌。

sentences.en: The descending sun was making brilliance upon the water.
sentences.cn: 落日将余辉洒在水面上.

sentences.en: The gorgeous costume added to the brilliance of the dance.
sentences.cn: 华丽的服装使舞蹈更加光彩夺目.

sentences.en: The stars glittered with the brilliance of jewels.
sentences.cn: 群星闪耀，犹如一颗颗璀璨的宝石。

sentences.en: There were flashes of brilliance from several of the players.
sentences.cn: 几位选手的才气不时闪现出来.

words.tran_cn: 灿烂的，闪耀的；杰出的；有才气的

trans.tran_en: a very high level of intelligence or skill
